entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Winterland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:55 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 03:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High plus 4 except plus 1 north of Terrenceville.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon except periods of snow north of Terrenceville. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4 except plus 1 north of Terrenceville. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 80 near midnight then south 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
